author: GamingBolt
description:
Onimusha 2: Samurai’s Destiny releases for modern hardware with a disappointingly conservative remaster, which means many of the game’s aged flaws and issues have been brought over as is with not much to blunt their edges. 

From dated design decisions to a frequently frustrating camera, there is plenty about Onimusha 2: Samurai’s Destiny that can easily frustrate the player, which means it isn’t necessarily the easiest recommendation. It does still have its strengths, of course, from solid combat to impressive art design and more, which means there’s still enjoyment enough to be had here, but most of the praise for the game does come with caveats.
title: Onimusha 2 Samurai's Destiny Remaster Review: Nostalgia Intact But This Is An Underwhelming Remaster

author: GamingBolt
description:
Technical issues aside, Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon puts the AA spin on the classic formula of The Elder Scrolls, with its own twists and unique aspects. There is so much to do across the world of Avalon to learn about the dark history of King Arthur and everyone that surrounded him, and the overall narrative is surprisingly engaging for this setting. 

The freedom offered in gameplay is a refreshing touch that allows you freedom to see and explore the world and fight some terrifying enemies. While technical issues plague the experience, what’s underneath is an incredibly ambitious and generally well-executed transition into games for the Tainted Grail franchise, and it’s an exciting vision for what this franchise and genre can be.
title: Tainted Grail The Fall of Avalon Review - A Great Game Marred By Technical Issues

author: GamingBolt
description:
The Nintendo Switch 2 is all set to launch in a few days, and the release day lineup of games is looking absolutely bonkers. One of those games is Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition, which packages the base game and its DLC Phantom Liberty in one single package. 

Scheduled to release on June 5, it comes packed with many features, both from a performance standpoint and also for utilizing the platform specific features that the Switch 2 is offering. 

With this video, we will be taking a look at 15 things you should know before buying Cyberpunk 2077 on the Switch 2.
title: Cyberpunk 2077 For Switch 2 - 15 NEW DETAILS You Need To Know Before You Buy
